title: Live From New York, It's The Bonfire! (w/ Joe Derosa)
description: Jay, Dan and Joe DeRosa discuss the firing of Shane Gillis from SNL. Jay gets a lesson in "White Girl Privilege" with Christine at the airport and after watching twerk video Dan and Jay try to decide whether or not they should get butt implants.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
